head.placeName: The Hogarth Press, 52 Tavistock Square, London, W.C.1

document.body:
Dear Eddy,
Yes, do come to tea here on Thursday, 5 o'clock . For a novelist you show a feeble and perverted psychology. Any thing less like my and Leonard's conversation I can't imagine. Did Leonard ever persuade me to accept an invitation? "Well, you're a damned fool if you do." thats his style:â€”mine is unprintable. but, in this case, flattering to you.
document.postScriptum: It is really (now I come to think of it) extremely good and kind of you to ask me.
